description: A unit of young female soldiers warned of a big attack. They were among the first Hamas killed on 7 October.
maintext: "The birders would put their cages right on the fence. It's strange because they can put the cage anywhere. The farmers would also go down right next to the fence in an area that is not agricultural and there is no reason other than to gather information about the system and see how they can pass it. It seemed suspicious to us," she says.
title: They were Israel's 'eyes on the border' - but their Hamas warnings went unheard
